articles.title: Rob Gronkowski announces that he will ‘retire as a Patriot’
articles.description:

articles.title: Donald Trump plans to be the 1st sitting US president at a regular-season NFL game since 1978
articles.description:
Only two other times did a president go to an NFL game during the regular season while in office, according to the league: Richard Nixon in 1969 and Jimmy Carter in 1978.

The post Donald Trump plans to be the 1st sitting US president at a regular-season NFL game since 1978 appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: MLB pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz charged with taking bribes to rig pitches for bettors
articles.description:
Ortiz was arrested by the FBI on Sunday morning at Boston Logan International Airport. He is expected to appear in federal court in Boston on Monday.

The post MLB pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz charged with taking bribes to rig pitches for bettors appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Paul Tagliabue, NFL commissioner of 17 years who led an era of riches and expansion, dies at 84
articles.description:
